Kun Wang
博士

英文
欢迎来到王琨的个人主页

志存高远，谨言慎行。

Highlight: TMS, 基于 计算模型导引的图灵机模拟器。

I am now a Ph.D. candidate of Computer Science in Nanjing University, China. I received my bachelor degree in computer science from Nanjing University in 2013 and was admitted to study for Ph.D. degree in the same year. My research interests include quantum computation, quantum programming and formal methods. Currently I am working on both theoretical analysis and experimental implementation of quantum walk.

I'm a big fan of Git, Python, and Linux. In my free time, I dive into writing blog, reading books and fitting. Also, I dedicated lots of my time into history of the world. Each programming language has its own privilege, now my favorite one is C.

Interested? Here's my resume, and contact me.
